template_input_params.name: azure_region
template_input_params.label: Azure Region
template_input_params.description: Azure region to deploy infrastructure resources

template_input_params.name: name_prefix
template_input_params.label: Prefix of Resource Names
template_input_params.description: Prefix of names for Azure resources; The name prefix must be 1-52 alphanumeric characters and dash

template_input_params.name: admin_user
template_input_params.label: Admin User to Access Virtual Machines
template_input_params.description: Name of an administrative user to be created in virtual machine and SQL service in this deployment; The user name must be 1-32 alphanumeric (with beginning at letters) and special characters including -._

template_input_params.name: admin_user_password
template_input_params.label: Admin User Password
template_input_params.description: Password of the newly created administrative user; The supplied password must be between 8-72 characters long, must not contain user name, and must satisfy at least 3 of password complexity requirements from the following: 1) Contains an uppercase character; 2) Contains a lowercase character; 3) Contains a numeric digit; 4) Contains a special character in exclamation point (!), dollar sign ($), number sign (#), or percent (%)

template_input_params.name: user_public_key
template_input_params.label: User Public Key
template_input_params.description: User-provided public SSH key used to connect to the virtual machine; The provided key must be 'None' or the openSSH format key with optional comment

template_input_params.name: bastion_private_key
template_input_params.description: Bastion private key for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion private key

template_input_params.name: bastion_password
template_input_params.description: Bastion user password for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion user password

template_input_params.name: bastion_host_key
template_input_params.description: Bastion host public key for ssh proxy
template_input_params.label: Bastion host key
